sentence: Florida's Puerto Rican Population Surpasses 1 Million, Rivaling New York
Population of Puerto Rican origin, in thousands
Note: Includes only Hispanics who selfidentify as Puerto Ricans People in group quarters such as college dormitories or
institutions are not Hispanics included in figures for 2001 2005 Changes in the Hispanic origin question in the 2000 decennial census
may have led to an unde roount of some Hispanic origin groups in thatyear.
Source: Pew Research Center ana lysis of the 1980, 1990, and 2000 decennial censuses (5% IPUMS), 2001 2013 American
Community Surveys (1% Center IPUMS) and 2014 American Community Survey (1 year estimate).
